title: Looking For Gold Mid and Subs For Iron-Gold Tournaments
body:
Digital Fury Blue are looking for a gold mid for a main roster and subs to play in the iron to gold weekly tournaments. It would be best if you are available for at least two of the three days (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday) and are on regularly. If you are interesting and want to know more, please add me. 

Thank you for considering,
DramaticChicken.
